sentences.sContent: I had no money left and was desperate.
sentences.sCn: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.sContent: Time was running out and we were getting desperate .
sentences.sCn: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

synos.tran: 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的

remMethod.val: de (否定) + sper (希望) + ate → 没希望的 → 令人绝望的

words.tran: 绝望的境地；不顾一切拼命

trans.tranCn: 令人绝望的； 不顾一切的， 拼死的
trans.tranOther: willing to do anything to change a very bad situation, and not caring about danger
